Producer: Alex Eckert, Randall Emmett, George Furla, Luillo Ruiz, Mark Stewart, Chad A. Verdi
Production Co: Verdi Productions, BondIt Media Capital, Emmett/Furla/Oasis Films, Buffalo 8 Productions
Synopsis: Bruce Willis (Pulp Fiction) and Chad Michael Murray ("Riverdale") star in this explosive crime-thriller. When cop David (Willis) is injured in a drug bust gone wrong, his partner, Cal, pursues the two criminals who shot him to a remote farm owned by troubled vet Eric (Murray). As Cal and Eric plot their defense, more of the gang arrives -- along with a wounded David -- and, outnumbered, the three heroes must use stealth, smarts, and marksmanship to take down the drug-dealing mob.
Title: Survive the Game
